Reference

Package

snippets

Manage RStudio snippets.

Install snippets

install_snippets_from_package() install_snippets_from_dir()

Install snippets.

Back-up and restore snippets

backup_rs_snippets() list_snippet_file_backups() get_path_snippets_backup_dir() create_snippets_backup_dir() get_snippets_backup_file_pattern() remove_snippet_backup_duplicates()

Manage back-up copies of snippets.

Snippet files and directories

create_rs_snippets_dir()

Create directory for RStudio snippets.

get_path_to_snippet_file() get_path_to_rs_snippet_file()

Construct path to file of certain type snippets.

get_rs_snippets_dir()

Get path to directory for RStudio snippets.

make_snippet_filename()

Make a filename for snippets.

open_rs_snippets_dir()

Open directory of RStudio snippets.

snippets_file_exists()

Does file with snippets exist?

Other functions

Get default snippet types.
